waypoints.onload: settings.profile.mobs = {100061}; -- Boar function getBag() if getQuestStatus(420064) == "incomplete" then -- The Lost Supplies player:target_Object({110080,110433}) -- Full Grain Bag elseif getQuestStatus(420531) == "incomplete" then -- Strong Boars __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("NORMAL") else __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN") end end
waypoints.waypoint: if getQuestStatus(420064) ~= "incomplete" and getQuestStatus(420531) ~= "incomplete" then loadPaths("1-10pioneersquests/l8t_camp") end
getBag() if getQuestStatus(420064) ~= "incomplete" and getQuestStatus(420531) ~= "incomplete" then loadPaths("1-10pioneersquests/l8t_camp") end
